text: Daulo Araian is a village in Kapurthala district of Punjab State, India. It is located from Kapurthala, which is both district and sub-district headquarters of Daulo Araian. The village is administrated by a Sarpanch, who is an elected representative. == Demography == According to the report published by Census India in 2011, Daulo Araian has a total number of 21 houses and population of 103 of which include 61 males and 42 females. Literacy rate of Daulo Araian is 80.81%, higher than state average of 75.84%. The population of children under the age of 6 years is 4 which is 3.88% of total population of Daulo Araian, and child sex ratio is approximately 0, lower than state average of 846. == Caste == The village has schedule caste (SC) constitutes zero percentage of total population of the village and it doesn't have any Schedule Tribe (ST) population. == Population data == {|class="wikitable sortable" !
